data.name: Masterpiece X
data.description:
Masterpiece X is the 3D platform for EVERY creator!

============
SPECIAL HOLIDAY OFFER
Buy Masterpiece X today - at a special, one-time price - and get lifetime access to the app (+ future updates) and unlock UNLIMITED PRIVATE EXPORTING!
============

We designed Masterpiece X for anyone who:
-> wants to start creating in 3D but isn't sure where to start
-> is frustrated with complex tools.

NEW: Introducing Masterpiece X - Generate - right in VR!
Our generative AI is the first text-to-3D tool to enable the creation of assets with mesh, textures, and animations (for human models only).

With only a few words, generate completely rigged & animated characters, animals and objects - and then remix them - all from right inside your Meta Quest headset!

With Masterpiece X, you can unlock an entirely new way to create 3D assets by:
> generating a complete 3D model: character, animal or object - using text-to-3D
(get 250 bonus credits free, additional credit purchases are available)
> remixing any part of your model - from mesh to texturing, rigging, and animation
> finding free-to-use models in the community library (or import your own)
> exporting your model to your game, virtual world, or creative project, and
> sharing it with our community to inspire & help others!

Masterpiece X is NOT a good fit  for creators who want:
> to start from scratch,
> elaborate control over simplicity, or
> a VR version of existing 3D modeling tools.

Get Masterpiece X and start creating 3D today!
